name: io.github.pab1it0/adx-mcp-server
description: MCP server providing Azure Data Explorer (ADX/Kusto) query execution and database exploration capabilities for AI assistants

AZURE_TENANT_ID.description: Azure AD tenant ID for Workload Identity authentication

AZURE_CLIENT_ID.description: Azure AD client/application ID for Workload Identity authentication

ADX_TOKEN_FILE_PATH.description: Path to Azure Workload Identity token file (default: /var/run/secrets/azure/tokens/azure-identity-token)

ADX_MCP_SERVER_TRANSPORT.description: Transport mode: stdio (default), http, or sse

ADX_MCP_BIND_HOST.description: Host to bind to for HTTP/SSE transports (default: 127.0.0.1)

ADX_MCP_BIND_PORT.description: Port to bind to for HTTP/SSE transports (default: 8080)

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a Kusto Query Language (KQL) query against the configured Azure Data Explorer database

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all tables available in the configured database

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Retrieves the schema information for a specified table

tools.name: sample_table_data
tools.description: Retrieves a random sample of rows from the specified table

tools.name: get_table_details
tools.description: Retrieves table statistics and metadata including row count and size
